name: Flatline
description: Versatile assault rifle, solid damage at close and medium ranges.

name: Havoc
description: Energy assault rifle, sustained fire, deadly with Turbocharger.

name: R-301
description: Reliable assault rifle, high rate of fire, low recoil.

name: Hemlok
description: Burst-fire rifle, precise shots at medium range.

name: Alternator
description: Light SMG, decent rate of fire, manageable recoil.

name: Prowler
description: Burst-fire SMG, transformable to full-auto, close to medium range.

name: R-99
description: High-rate of fire SMG, excellent close-range damage.

name: Volt
description: Versatile energy SMG, low recoil, suitable for mid-range.

name: CAR
description: Compact SMG, moderate rate of fire, good accuracy.

name: Devotion
description: Rapid-fire LMG, slow start, high speed over time.

name: L-STAR
description: Powerful energy LMG, high rate of fire, prone to overheating.

name: Spitfire
description: Heavy LMG, large magazine, sustained fire, effective against shields.

name: G7 Scout
description: Semi-auto marksman rifle, accurate shots at medium to long range.

name: Triple Take
description: Unique sniper rifle, fires three projectiles, effective for close to medium range.

name: 30-30 Repeater
description: Lever-action marksman rifle, high damage, precise long-range engagements.

name: Charge Rifle
description: Powerful sniper rifle, high damage, requires charge-up before firing.

name: Longbow
description: Semi-auto sniper rifle, precise shots, high damage at long range.

name: Sentinel
description: Bolt-action sniper rifle, high damage, charge-up shots for more damage.

name: EVA-8
description: Semi-auto shotgun, good damage at close range.

name: Mozambique
description: Triple-barrel shotgun pistol, moderate damage at close range.

name: Peacekeeper
description: Lever-action shotgun, high damage, effective at close range.

name: RE-45
description: Full-auto pistol, moderate rate of fire, suitable for close-quarters combat.

name: P2020
description: Semi-auto pistol, decent rate of fire, moderate damage.

name: Wingman
description: High-caliber revolver, high damage per shot, effective at mid-range.

name: Nemesis
description: A fast burst energy SMG that keeps shooting faster as you go.
